typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Group as string,
		{Group CN} as string,
		Division as string,
		{Division CN} as string,
		Site as string,
		{Site CN} as string,
		Code as string,
		{Personal Area} as string,
		Capabilities as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> srcsite
srcsite sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'Site.cdm.json/Site',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestName: 'Enterprise',
	corpusPath: 'enterprisecdm/entity_cdm_files',
	partitionPath: 'data',
	folderPath: 'enterprisecdm',
	fileSystem: 'cdm',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'cdm',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinksite
